basic.description: The first part of a two-semester sequence, this course covers the functional anatomy and physiology of the skeletal, muscular, cardiovascular, respiratory, digestive, urinary, and endocrine systems, as well as part of the nervous system.
basic.subject: PET
basic.title: Functional Anatomy and Physiology I

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: CHM 1045 and HUN 1201. Corequisite: PET 3322L.
